name: PREETHU!!
greetingText: wishing you a birthday as beautiful and wonderful as you!
wishText: May your journey unfold  like the most beautiful code ever written! ❤️
textInChatBox: HAPPY BIRTHDAY to u, may this year brings u endless happiness..
text2: I thought about sending just a simple message.
outroText: may u r every moment be filled with love joy,and the warmth of the people who cherish you the most. Keep shining,keep smiling and never stop being the incredible person you are....
replayText: Click here to feel my birthday wish again.
